title: Cuemon.Runtime
description: The Cuemon.Runtime assembly is a member of the Cuemon .NET Core family and provides enhancements to the System.Runtime namespace.
summary: A free and flexible assembly family, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possibilities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers and the likes thereof.
releaseNotes: The initial release of the ported Cuemon .NET Framework.
